errors.name: AlreadyResolved
errors.msg: Market is already resolved

errors.msg: Creation fee is below protocol minimum

errors.msg: Protocol fee basis points invalid

errors.msg: Trading fee basis points invalid

errors.msg: Trading fee split does not match total trading fee

errors.msg: Liquidity goal must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidCreatorMigrationReward
errors.msg: Creator migration reward must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidStakingPoolCap
errors.msg: Staking pool cap must be at least as large as liquidity goal

errors.name: MetadataUriTooLong
errors.msg: Metadata URI exceeds length limit

errors.name: InvalidMetadataHash
errors.msg: Metadata hash must be 32 bytes

errors.name: ArithmeticOverflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow occurred

errors.name: ConfigNotInitialized
errors.msg: Config not initialized

errors.name: MissingBump
errors.msg: Missing PDA bump

errors.name: InvalidOrderAmount
errors.msg: Order amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidOutcome
errors.msg: Outcome must be 0 (NO), 1 (YES), or -1 (unresolved)

errors.name: MarketNotOpen
errors.msg: Market is not accepting new orders

errors.name: NetAmountTooSmall
errors.msg: Order amount after fees must be positive

errors.name: InvalidStakeAmount
errors.msg: Stake amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidStakeLockup
errors.msg: Stake lockup must be in the future

errors.name: StakingPoolCapExceeded
errors.msg: Staking pool cap exceeded

errors.name: CtoAlreadyRequested
errors.msg: Community takeover already requested for this market

errors.name: CtoNotRequested
errors.msg: Community takeover has not been requested

errors.msg: Referral code is invalid

errors.msg: Referral relationship already locked

errors.msg: Cannot refer yourself

errors.name: TradeBelowReferralMinimum
errors.msg: Trade amount below referral minimum

errors.name: InvalidReferralRate
errors.msg: Referral reward basis points invalid

errors.msg: Insufficient rewards to claim

errors.name: InvalidCtoRecipient
errors.msg: New fee recipient must be provided

errors.name: FeeRecipientUnchanged
errors.msg: Fee recipient is unchanged

errors.name: InsufficientPosition
errors.msg: Position does not have sufficient shares for this action

errors.name: InvalidPositionOwner
errors.msg: Position owner does not match signer

errors.name: MarketNotResolved
errors.msg: Market has not been resolved yet

errors.name: RewardsAlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: Rewards have already been claimed for this position

errors.name: NothingToClaim
errors.msg: No winnings available to claim

errors.name: StakeStillLocked
errors.msg: Stake is still locked

errors.name: StakeAlreadyCompleted
errors.msg: Stake already completed

errors.name: NoRewardsAvailable
errors.msg: No staking rewards available

errors.msg: Only the config authority may perform this action

errors.name: InsufficientLiquidity
errors.msg: Insufficient liquidity in the pool for this operation

errors.name: SlippageTooHigh
errors.msg: Slippage tolerance exceeded

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized: only specific user can perform this action

errors.name: InvalidWarmupPeriod
errors.msg: Warmup period must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidLiquidityParameter
errors.msg: Liquidity parameter must be greater than zero

errors.name: MarketAlreadyResolved
errors.msg: Market has already been resolved

errors.name: EndTimestampNotInFuture
errors.msg: New end timestamp must be in the future

errors.name: EndTimestampNotExtended
errors.msg: New end timestamp must be after the current end timestamp

errors.name: MarketNotUnresolved
errors.msg: Market is not in Unresolved state

errors.name: RefundAlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: Refund already claimed for this position

types.name: ReferralAccount
docs: Referral account tracks referral relationships and rewards
Each user has one referral account (PDA) that stores:
- Total rewards accrued for their referrer

types.name: RewardVault
docs: Reward vault account tracks unclaimed referral rewards for a referrer
Each referrer has one reward vault (PDA) that accumulates rewards
